Emeka Emezie 16 Yd pass from Ryan Finley (Christopher Dunn Kick)
Cary Angeline 14 Yd pass from Ryan Finley (Christopher Dunn Kick)

videos.headline: Virginia gets on the board with 35-yard TD
videos.description: Cavaliers quarterback Bryce Perkins fires a 35-yard strike down the field to wide receiver Olamide Zaccheaus for a Virginia touchdown.

videos.headline: NC State WR snatches TD pass from defender
videos.description: Wolf Pack quarterback Ryan Finley fires a 16-yard pass to Emeka Emezie, who muscles the 50-50 ball from a Cavaliers defender for a touchdown.

videos.headline: NC State QB closes 1st half with TD pass
videos.description: Wolf Pack quarterback Ryan Finley shows beautiful touch on a 14-yard touchdown pass to Cary Angeline.

videos.headline: Wolf Pack RB walks in for 6
videos.description: NC State running back Reggie Gallaspy II powers into the end zone for a 2-yard touchdown.

videos.headline: Virginia QB extends play and slings TD
videos.description: Cavaliers quarterback Bryce Perkins is flushed out of the pocket and fires a strike to Olamide Zaccheaus for a 9-yard touchdown, their second scoring connection of the game.
